EmailTemplate.name: September Emails 2018.EMEA - App Dynamics - CN Insights Email 9-14-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Recording - Cloud-Native Insights: How Platform & App Visibility Drive Business Outcomes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to view the webinar recording of Cloud-Native Insights: How Platform & App Visibility Drive Business Outcomes <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/sep-13-cloud-native-insights-how-platform-app-visibility-can-drive-business-outcome-webinar?utm_source=emea &utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=cn-insights&utm_term=q318]]>.
As companies continue to migrate their applications to the cloud, they need increased levels of visibility into their infrastructure and applications. In this session, you’ll learn how to:
- Enable your DevOps teams with seamless, instant, business performance monitoring
- Detect any emerging issue before it becomes a business problem
- Ensure every code release drives business outcomes
Presenters: Mark Prichard, Senior Director of Product Management, AppDynamics Jonah Kowal, VP Market Development & Insights, AppDynamics Kamala Dasika, GTM for Pivotal Cloud Foundry Technology Partners, Pivotal
View Recording <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/sep-13-cloud-native-insights-how-platform-app-visibility-can-drive-business-outcome-webinar?utm_source=emea &utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=cn-insights&utm_term=q318]]>
Additional resources for this session include:
- AppDynamics Service Broker for PCF: Full-Stack Performance Monitoring for PCF <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/services-marketplace/monitoring-metrics-and-logging/appdynamics?utm_source=emea&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=cn-insights&utm_term=q318]]>
- The .NET Renaissance is Happening Now: Here's Why It's a New Era for .NET Developers <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-net-renaissance-is-happening-now-here-s-why-it-s-a-new-era-for-net-developers?utm_source=emea&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=cn-insights&utm_term=q318]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://info.pivotal.io/c000200I0NAU0rCJC001O00]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://info.pivotal.io/TDAIO000r0000U220N00CJ0]]>.
